item.title: Samsung Galaxy Note 2 Review
item.description: So I have a confession to make. What seems like an eternity ago, I received a Galaxy Note review unit for ATT, but never quite finished my review. While the reasons for that were no fault of the device and rather the result of some other personal failings, I spent a lot of time with the original Note really trying to size up the experience of using the world’s first smartphone that crossed over into tablet territory — a so-called “phablet.
